name: stalwart
description: Stalwart Mail Server is a modern self-hosted email platform with IMAP, JMAP, and SMTP support. It focuses on performance, security, and ease of deployment.
features: IMAP server: Provides full-featured IMAP4rev2 support for email clients.
JMAP protocol: Implements modern JMAP protocol for efficient email sync.
SMTP server: Handles incoming and outgoing email with advanced routing.
Spam filtering: Blocks spam with built-in filters and external integration.
Sieve scripting: Automates email filtering with Sieve script support.
Full-text search: Searches emails quickly with indexed full-text search.
Encryption support: Handles TLS/SSL for secure email transmission.
Multiple domains: Hosts email for multiple domains from single instance.
Quota management: Enforces storage limits per user or domain.
Authentication: Supports various auth methods including OAuth2 and LDAP.
High performance: Handles thousands of concurrent connections efficiently.
Web admin: Manages server configuration through web-based interface.
